definition: Father of Aequa. Governance senator who visits Vis at Villa Telimus.
Class Four student at the Academy. Daughter of Adventus. Attended the naumachia with Vis.
Septimus in charge of the stables at the Academy.

title: Matron
definition: Woman in charge of the orphanage at Letens.
Class Four student at the Academy.
Sextus and Dispensator of the Quiscil household.
Class Four student at the Academy.
Class Four student at the Academy.
Class Three student at the Academy. Known for her prowess at Foundation and running the Labyrinth.
A child from the orphanage in Letens.
Brother to Ulciscor. Killed during the Iudicium at the Academy several years ago.
Class Seven student at the Academy.
Vis's younger sister, princess of Suus.
Class Four student at the Academy.

title: King
definition: Vis's father, king of Suus.
Vis's birth name, and also the name he gives to the alupi he saves as a pup on Solivagus.
Class Seven student at the Academy.

title: Praeceptor
definition: Teacher in charge of Class Six at the Academy.
Class Six student at the Academy.
Woman in charge of the fights at the Letens Theatre.
Class Three student at the Academy.
Also known as Melior, leader of the Anguis. Former advisor to King Cristoval, and former tutor to Vis.

title: Princeps
definition: Princeps of Military.
Former advisor to King Cristoval, and former tutor to Vis. Current steward of Suus under the Hierarchy.
Class Four student at the Academy.
Class Four student at the Academy.

title: Praeceptor
definition: Teacher in charge of Class Seven at the Academy.
Physician who tests Vis's blood after the naumachia.
Bookkeeper for bets on fights at the Letens Theatre.
The fake name Ulciscor uses at Letens Prison.
The Septimus in charge of Letens Prison, under whom Vis is employed.
Class Six student at the Academy.
Ellanher's "cousin" at the Letens Theatre.
Class Three student at the Academy. Son of Dimidius Quiscil of Military.
Class Three student at the Academy. Younger sister killed during the attack on the naumachia.
Dispensator in charge of running Villa Telimus. Former head of the Azriat in Sytrece.
Tutor to Vis during his time at Villa Telimus. Assisting Ulciscor in his search to find the truth about Caeror's death.
Ulciscor and Caeror's father.
Class Four student at the Academy.

title: Proconsul
definition: Catenan in charge of the Tensian province.
Class Four student at the Academy.
Assistant to Veridius at the Academy.
The owner of the harbourside tavern in Suus.
A Sapper-bound prisoner in Letens Prison.

title: Praeceptor
definition: Teacher in charge of Class Three at the Academy.
Class Three student at the Academy.

title: Magnus Dimidius
definition: Indol's father.
Ulciscor's wife.

title: Praeceptor
definition: Teacher in charge of Class Four at the Academy.
The name given by the Anguis agent who arranges the attack on Vis's Transvect.
Class Three student at the Academy.
The name given to all orphans in the Hierarchy.

title: Praeceptor
definition: Teacher in charge of Class Five at the Academy.
Class Four student at the Academy.
Class Four student at the Academy.
Senator who meets Vis at Letens Prison and ultimately offers him the chance to attend the Catenan Academy.
Physician at the Academy.
Class Four student at the Academy.
The Principalis, in charge of the Academy.
A child from the orphanage in Letens.
The name adopted by Diago after he fled Suus.
Vis's older sister, princess of Suus.
